content: from coats & clark baby book book no 510 **materials ** * j & p coats knit-cro-sheen metallic art a 64 9 9 10 10 balls of no m 76 robinette * steel crochet hook no 6 * 3 yards of velvet ribbon 1/4 inch wide * 3 snap fasteners * 1 hook and eye **gauge ** 8 double_crochet make 1 inch 3 single_crochet row and 2 double_crochet row make 1 inch
